comment: boiled 6 cups of water and added DME and 0.75 lb of LME for 20 min.  (Hope was to cut some of Hoppiness in the Diablo kit.  Remove wort from heat and add remainder of LME and 2 cups water.  Add final wort to 2 gal of spring water in fermenter.  Let cool down and pitch yeast.  OG was 1.055.
